attributes.action: Lord Patton should resign as Chairman of the BBC Trust.
attributes.additional_details:
Lord Patton is supposed to be looking after the interests of the licence fee payer. He should be vociferously objecting to the outrageous payment to Mr.Entwistle, ie twice as much as he was contracted to receive.

Therefore,I don't trust Lord Patton to look after licence fee payers interests. I appeal to the Culture Secretary to ask for his resignation.

rejection.details: This is a matter for Lord Patten and the BBC Trust. The BBC Trust is independent of Government.
